com.tractrac.model.lib.impl.spatial

Class CoordinateArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tractrac.model.lib.impl.spatial.CoordinateArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICoordinateSequence

    public class CoordinateArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICoordinateSequence
    Base implementation of an ICoordinateSequence, using an array of Coordinates.
    Author:
    Jesper Grooss

      • locateAlong

        public Coordinate locateAlong(double mOffset)
        Description copied from interface: ICoordinateSequence
        Returns the coordinate at the specified m ordinate value

        It is required that the coordinates has an m ordiante value and is sorted in order of strictly increasing m ordinate value

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
